room_title: Escape room "Ghosts of the Black Hills" by Black Hills Escape Rooms in Rapid City
room_description:
The "Lady in White" haunts the Alex Johnson hotel. The SyFY channel documented her on "Ghost Hunters" in season 7. She is upset about her death being ruled a suicide. She was getting married and inheriting a great sum of money.
Did she really kill herself or did the investigators miss something? It is up to you to solve the mystery as well as help out a few other familiar Black Hill's ghosts.
